channel.title: CVE Feed for FireEye -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FireEye -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-0317|2024-08-01T18:04:48.538Z -- fireeye -- fireeye%20ex
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting in FireEye EX, affecting version 9.0.3.936727. Exploitation of this vulnerability allows an attacker to send a specially crafted JavaScript payload via the 'type' and 's_f_name' parameters to an authenticated user to retrieve their session details.

item.title: CVE-2024-0320|2024-08-01T18:04:49.037Z -- fireeye -- fireeye%20malware%20analysis%20%28ax%29
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting in FireEye Malware Analysis (AX) affecting version 9.0.3.936530. This vulnerability allows an attacker to send a specially crafted JavaScript payload in the application URL to retrieve the session details of a legitimate user.

item.title: CVE-2024-0318|2024-08-01T18:04:49.017Z -- fireeye -- fireeye%20hxtool
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting in FireEye HXTool affecting version 4.6. This vulnerability allows an attacker to store a specially crafted JavaScript payload in the 'Profile Name' and 'Hostname/IP' parameters that will be triggered when items are loaded.

item.title: CVE-2024-0316|2024-08-01T18:04:49.060Z -- fireeye -- fireeye%20endpoint%20security
item.description: Improper cleanup vulnerability in exceptions thrown in FireEye Endpoint Security, affecting version 5.2.0.958244. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to send multiple request packets to the containment_notify/preview parameter, which could lead to a service outage.

item.title: CVE-2024-0314|2024-08-01T18:04:48.586Z -- fireeye -- fireeye%20central%20management
item.description: XSS vulnerability in FireEye Central Management affecting version 9.1.1.956704, which could allow an attacker to modify special HTML elements in the application and cause a reflected XSS, leading to a session hijacking.

item.title: CVE-2024-0319|2024-08-01T18:04:48.968Z -- fireeye -- fireeye%20hxtool
item.description: Open Redirect vulnerability in FireEye HXTool affecting version 4.6, the exploitation of which could allow an attacker to redirect a legitimate user to a malicious page by changing the 'redirect_uri' parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-0315|2024-08-01T18:04:48.597Z -- fireeye -- fireeye%20central%20management
item.description: Remote file inclusion vulnerability in FireEye Central Management affecting version 9.1.1.956704. This vulnerability allows an attacker to upload a malicious PDF file to the system during the report creation process.
